product_name: Royal Robbins Nuevo Summer Dress - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Ready for a new dress? The sleeveless Nuevo Summer Dress from Royal Robbins is perfect: simple yet elegant for summer activities, and made of a soft fiber blend. Textured jersey knit blends hemp and organic cotton, and is garment washed for softness. Hemp has natural antimicrobial properties and UV resistance; dress offers UPF 50+ sun protection. Nuevo Summer Dress from Royal Robbins features a cowl neck and flattering front seams. Closeout.
short_description: Ready for a new dress? The sleeveless Nuevo Summer Dress from Royal Robbins is perfect: simple yet elegant for summer activities, and made of a soft fiber blend.
